meanings.definition: The direction in which a compass needle normally points, toward the horizon on the left side of a person facing east.
meanings.sent1: When we hike, we always make sure to head north to stay on track.
meanings.sent2: The map showed that the treasure was hidden to the north of the old oak tree.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel decided to move all the acorns north of the tree stump.
meanings.sent4: Her heart always pulled her north, seeking new adventures and experiences.
meanings.sent5: The north wind howled through the night, carrying tales of distant lands.

meanings.definition: The northern part of a country, region, or city.
meanings.sent1: In winter, the north of the country is covered in a blanket of snow.
meanings.sent2: The north of the city is known for its bustling markets and lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The bakery in the north of town always has the freshest bread and pastries.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts always drifted to the north of the country, where his ancestors once lived.
meanings.sent5: The north of the region is famous for its stunning mountain ranges and crystal-clear lakes.
